name: Dreadnaught Legplates
tooltip:
Dreadnaught LegplatesLevel 60

Korfax at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreadnaught Legplates if you bring him the following items: 1 Desecrated Legplates, 20 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 4 Arcanite Bars and 3 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Legplates
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 20
- Arcanite Bar x 4
- Cured Rugged Hide x 3
